mil7.2.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘dipiniya ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.4:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, dipini sakimyeva gabbham ganhati, na punappunam purisam upeti?
mil7.2.4:1.3: Evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ayatim patisandhim uppattim gabbhaseyyam cutim bhedam khayam vinasam samsarabhayam duggatim visamam sampilitam disva ‘punabbhave nappatisandahissami’ti yoniso manasikaro karaniyo.
mil7.2.4:1.4: Idam, maharaja, dipiniya ekam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.4:1.5: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena suttanipate dhaniyagopalakasutte—
